mean_cn: adj.抑制精神的；  n.安定药
mean_en: tranquilizer used to treat psychotic conditions when a calming effect is desired
sentence: He freaked out so badly they had to inject him with an antipsychotic drug.
sentence_trans: 他情绪太激动，他们只好给他注射安定药。
word_etyma: anti抵抗 + psychotic精神病的 → antipsychotic 抗精神病的，治疗精神病的
